games.title: Throwdown
games.subtitle: Card Battle Adventure
games.shortDescription: Experience an exciting card-based strategy game with unique characters, epic battles, and endless combinations!
games.description: Throwdown is an intense card battle game where strategy and quick thinking are key. Collect powerful cards, build unbeatable decks, and challenge players from around the world in epic duels. With hundreds of unique cards to discover and countless combinations to master, no two battles are ever the same.

screenshots.caption: Build powerful decks from hundreds of unique cards
Engage in strategic battles with stunning visual effects

developer.name: CyberCard Studios
developer.title: Lead Game Designer
developer.quote: We wanted to create a card game that's easy to learn but takes a lifetime to master. Every card interaction was meticulously balanced to ensure fair and exciting gameplay.

highlights: Collect over 500 unique cards with special abilities
Build custom decks with strategic combinations
Battle players worldwide in real-time PvP matches
Climb the competitive ranks and earn exclusive rewards
Regular content updates with new cards and game modes
howToPlay: Build your deck by selecting 30 cards from your collection
Draw cards each turn and manage your energy resources
Play cards strategically to counter your opponent's moves
Reduce your opponent's health to zero to win the match

features.title: Deck Building
features.description: Create powerful deck combinations from hundreds of unique cards

features.title: PvP Battles
features.description: Challenge players from around the world in real-time matches

features.title: Tournaments
features.description: Compete in regular tournaments for exclusive prizes and glory

games.title: Cyber Legends
games.subtitle: Futuristic Team-Based Combat
games.shortDescription: Join the futuristic team-based card combat in a dystopian cyber world!
games.description: Cyber Legends combines card strategy with futuristic team-based combat. Set in a dystopian cyber world, you'll assemble a team of unique heroes, each with their own abilities and synergies. Engage in tactical 3v3 battles that require quick thinking and strategic planning to outmaneuver your opponents.

screenshots.caption: Choose from dozens of unique heroes with special abilities

developer.name: NeoTech Games
developer.title: Creative Director
developer.quote: Cyber Legends was born from our love of both card games and team-based combat. We wanted to create something that rewards both strategic deck building and tactical real-time decisions.

highlights: Collect and upgrade 40+ unique heroes with different abilities
Assemble the perfect team with complementary strengths
Engage in fast-paced 3v3 team battles
Climb competitive ranks and earn exclusive cosmetics
Regular content updates with new heroes and game modes
howToPlay: Assemble your team by selecting 3 heroes from your collection
Position your heroes strategically on the battlefield
Cast ability cards to support your team and counter opponents
Coordinate with teammates to secure objectives and victory

features.title: Hero Collection
features.description: Collect and upgrade diverse heroes with unique abilities

features.title: Competitive Leagues
features.description: Climb the ranked ladder and earn exclusive rewards

games.title: Block Bits
games.subtitle: Creative Mining Adventure
games.shortDescription: Build, mine, and explore in this creative voxel-based adventure!
games.description: Block Bits is an immersive voxel-based adventure where creativity knows no bounds. Mine resources, craft tools, build structures, and survive in a procedurally generated world full of danger and wonder. Whether you prefer to build magnificent structures, explore deep caves, or battle dangerous creatures, Block Bits offers endless possibilities.

screenshots.caption: Create magnificent structures block by block
Explore mysterious caves filled with valuable resources

developer.name: Cubic Studios
developer.title: Technical Director
developer.quote: We believe in giving players complete freedom to express their creativity. Block Bits was designed to be a canvas where players can build anything they imagine while also enjoying survival and adventure elements.

highlights: Infinite procedurally generated worlds to explore
Gather resources and craft items to survive
Build anything from simple shelters to complex structures
Discover rare materials in dangerous cave systems
Join multiplayer servers and collaborate with friends
howToPlay: Gather resources by mining blocks in the world
Craft tools and items to help you survive
Build structures to protect yourself from dangers
Explore caves and dungeons for rare materials

features.title: Creative Building
features.description: Build anything you can imagine with thousands of block types

features.title: Survival Gameplay
features.description: Gather resources, craft items, and survive in a challenging world

features.title: Multiplayer
features.description: Join servers with friends and build collaborative projects

games.title: Speed Racer
games.subtitle: Futuristic Racing
games.shortDescription: Race through neon-lit tracks in this high-speed futuristic racing game!
games.description: Speed Racer is a high-octane futuristic racing game featuring antigravity vehicles and impossible tracks. Push the limits of speed as you race through neon-lit cityscapes, zero-gravity space stations, and otherworldly environments. Customize your vehicle, master boost mechanics, and compete against players worldwide for the title of ultimate Speed Racer.

screenshots.caption: Customize your vehicle with performance upgrades and skins

developer.name: Velocity Studios
developer.title: Game Director
developer.quote: We wanted to create a racing game that defies physics and delivers pure adrenaline. Speed Racer pushes the boundaries of what's possible in racing games with its extreme speeds and impossible tracks.

highlights: Race on 25+ unique tracks across 5 fantastical environments
Choose from 15 antigravity vehicles with different specs
Customize your ride with performance parts and visual upgrades
Master the boost system and track-specific shortcuts
Compete in global tournaments with thousands of players
howToPlay: Choose your vehicle and customize it to suit your racing style
Learn each track's layout and discover hidden shortcuts
Collect boost energy during races to activate speed bursts
Compete against other players in real-time multiplayer races

features.title: Antigravity Racing
features.description: Experience high-speed racing that defies the laws of physics

features.title: Track Variety
features.description: Race on 25+ unique tracks across diverse environments

features.title: Vehicle Customization
features.description: Upgrade and personalize your vehicle for optimal performance
